fields.name: supAutid
fields.title: ID da AF
fields.description: Supply Authorization ID

fields.name: supAutNumber
fields.title: Nº da AF
fields.description: Supply Authorization Number according to the Fiscal Management System - SIGEF

fields.name: supAutIssueDate
fields.title: Data de Emissão da AF
fields.description: Date of issuance of the Supply Authorization in the Tax Management System - SIGEF

fields.name: supAutManUnitcode
fields.title: UG Contratante
fields.description: Code of the management unit responsible for hiring

fields.name: supAutManUnit
fields.title: Nome Contratante
fields.description: Name of the management unit responsible for hiring

fields.name: supAutManTypeCode
fields.title: Código Gestão
fields.description: Contractor management code responsible for contracting. Describe better what is contract management

fields.name: supAutManType
fields.title: Gestão Contratante
fields.description: Name of contracting management responsible for contracting. Describe better what is contract management

fields.name: supAutTotValue
fields.title: Valor Total AF
fields.description: Total value of Supply Authorization. It presents the sum of the total values of each of the items contained in the Supply Authorization.

fields.name: supAutDeliveryDeadLine
fields.title: Prazo de Entrega
fields.description: Deadline for delivery of the material requested in the Supply Authorization. Information recorded in number of days for delivery from the date of issue of the AF.

fields.name: supAutManUnitCnpj
fields.title: CNPJ Contratante
fields.description: Number of the contracting management unit in the National Register of Legal Entities.

fields.name: prdSgpeAgency
fields.title: Órgão SGPE ARP
fields.description: Abbreviation of the body relating to the SGPE process opened for the Price Registration Minutes

fields.name: prdSgpeNumber
fields.title: Nº SGPE ARP
fields.description: Number of the SGPE process opened for the Price Registration Minute in the body

fields.name: prdSgpeYear
fields.title: Ano SGPE ARP
fields.description: Year of registration of the SGPE process opened for the Price Registration Minutes

fields.name: supAutCigNumber
fields.title: Nº CIG
fields.description: AF number in the Managerial Information Register of the Farm Management System - SIGEF

fields.name: supAutPaymentDeadLine
fields.title: Prazo de Pagamento
fields.description: Deadline for payment of Supply Authorization. Information recorded in number of days for payment from the approval of the material delivered

fields.name: supplierCnpj
fields.title: CNPJ do Fornecedor
fields.description: Supplier number in the National Register of Legal Entities

fields.name: supplierName
fields.title: Fornecedor
fields.description: Supplier name

fields.name: bidNumber
fields.title: Nº do Edital
fields.description: Bidding number

fields.name: prdNumber
fields.title: Nº da Ata de Registro de Preços
fields.description: Price Registration documento number

fields.name: itemCode
fields.title: Código do Item
fields.description: Item code as defined in the basic materials catalog

fields.name: itemDescription
fields.title: Descrição do Item
fields.description: Description of the item as defined in the public notice

fields.name: itemMeasureUnit
fields.title: Unidade de Medida
fields.description: Item's Unit of Measure

fields.name: commitNoteNumber
fields.title: Nota de Empenho
fields.description: Commitment note number as registered in the Tax Management System - SIGEF

fields.name: itemQuant
fields.title: Quantidade
fields.description: Quantity defined for the purchase of the item according to the notice

fields.name: itemUnitPrice
fields.title: Preço Unitário
fields.description: Unit price of the item according to the public notice awarded

fields.name: itemTotValue
fields.title: Valor Total Item
fields.description: Total value of each item. Shows the multiplication between the unit value of the item [itemUnitPrice] and its quantity [itemQuant].

fields.name: deliveryAdress
fields.title: Endereço - Logradouro
fields.description: Address of the delivery place of the material contained in the AF

fields.name: deliveryAdressComp
fields.title: Endereço - Complemento
fields.description: Complement of the address of the place of delivery of the material contained in the AF. It can be apartment number, house number, etc.

fields.name: deliveryNeigh
fields.title: Endereço - Bairro
fields.description: Name of the delivery district of the material contained in the AF

fields.name: deliveryCity
fields.title: Endereço - Cidade
fields.description: Name of the city of delivery of the material contained in the AF

fields.name: deliveryCep
fields.title: CEP
fields.description: Zip code of the place of delivery of the material contained in the AF

fields.name: deliveryPhone
fields.title: Telefone
fields.description: Contact telephone number for the delivery location of the material included in the AF

fields.name: sendRequestDate
fields.title: Data de Requisição
fields.description: AF request date from the supplier, data automatically entered when completing the task in the workflow engine

fields.name: orderDispatchDate
fields.title: Data de Despacho
fields.description: AF dispatch date by the supplier, data automatically entered at the end of the task in the workflow engine

fields.name: orderReceptDate
fields.title: Data de Recebimento
fields.description: Date of receipt of the request by the requester, data automatically inserted at the end of the task in the workflow engine

fields.name: orderReceptAprov
fields.title: Aprovação do Pedido
fields.description: Approval / disapproval record of the request by the requester, data automatically inserted at the end of the task in the workflow engine. 'True' when material is approved.

fields.name: orderReceptAprovDate
fields.title: Data de Aprovação
fields.description: Date of approval/disapproval of the order, , data automatically entered at the end of the task in the workflow engine

fields.name: orderReceptPayDate
fields.title: Data de Pagamento
fields.description: Order payment date

fields.name: orderReceptPayNote
fields.title: Nº da Nota de Pagamento
fields.description: AF payment note number

name: T2_supply_authorization_META_DATA
title: T2 - Supply Authorization - Meta Data
description: Data dictionary containing the fields related to the Supply Authorization Smart Contract
